contentrichtext.text: {{context|date=May 2011}} {{null|date=May 2011}} {{Chinese name|Qiu}} '''Qiu Haitao''' ({{zh|s=邱海涛|t=邱海濤|p=Qiū Hǎitāo}}; born August 15, 1973) is a female [[PR China|Chinese]] [[softball]] player. She competed in the [[2000 Summer Olympics]] finishing fourth.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://sportsillustrated.cnn.com/olympics/2000/softball/news/2000/09/25/us_australia_ap/|title=U.S. advances to gold medal game, defeats Australia|date=25 September 2000|work=CNN Sports Illustrated|accessdate=30 April 2010}}</ref> She played three matches. ==References== {{reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Qiu, Haitao | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Chinese softball player | DATE OF BIRTH = August 15, 1973 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Qiu, Haitao}} [[Category:1973 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Chinese softball players]] [[Category:Olympic softball players of China]] [[Category:Softball players at the 2000 Summer Olympics]] {{PRChina-softball-bio-stub}}
